# Variables {#sec-variables .unnumbered}

| Symbol      | Variable | Unit              | Description                                      |
|--------------|--------------|----------|------------------------------|
| $V_{cmax}$  | vcmax    | $\mu$mol/CO$_2$/s | Maximum carboxylation rate of rubisco            |
| $J_{max}$   | jmax     | $\mu$mol/CO$_2$/s | Maximum rate of electron transport                                                 |
| $J$   | j     | $\mu$mol/CO$_2$/s | Electron transport rate                                             |
| $g_s$       | gs       | $\mu$mol/CO$_2$/s | Stomatal conductance in units of CO $_2$             |
| $c_i$       | ci       | \-                | Leaf-internal CO$_2$ concentration               |
| $A_c$       | ac       |   $\mu$mol/CO$_2$/s                | Carboxylation-limited photosynthesis             |
| $A_j$       | aj       |   $\mu$mol/CO$_2$/s                | RuBP-limited (electron-transport limited) photosynthesis                      |
| $A_{gross}$ | agross   |   $\mu$mol/CO$_2$/s                | Gross photosynthesis                             |
| $K$ | kmm   |   Pa                | Michaelis-Menten Constant                             |
| $\Gamma^{\star}$ | gammastar   |   Pa                | Photorespiration Point                             |
| $D$         | vpd\_\*  | Pa                | Vapor pressure deficit of air or within the leaf |
| $T$         | tc_\_\*  | ÂºC                | Leaf or air temperature |
| $a$         | not used | -                | Marginal costs for water uptake |
| $b$         | not used | -                | Marginal costs for nitrogen uptake |
| $\eta^{\star}$         | n\_star  | -                | Relative viscosity of water |
| $\beta$         | beta  | -                | Unit cost ratio of acquiring nitrogen over water |
| $c$         | beta  | -                | Unit cost for maintaining electron transport |
